com.uploadcare.api

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uploadcare.api.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Uploadcare API client. Provides simple access to File and Project resources.
    See Also:
    File, Project

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client(java.lang.String publicKey, java.lang.String privateKey)
      Initializes a client with custom access keys and simple authentication.
      Client(java.lang.String publicKey, java.lang.String privateKey, boolean simpleAuth, RequestHelperProvider requestHelperProvider)
      Initializes a client with custom access keys.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String publicKey,
              java.lang.String privateKey)
        Initializes a client with custom access keys and simple authentication.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - Public key
        privateKey - Private key

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String publicKey,
              java.lang.String privateKey,
              boolean simpleAuth,
              RequestHelperProvider requestHelperProvider)
        Initializes a client with custom access keys. Can use simple or secure authentication.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - Public key
        privateKey - Private key
        simpleAuth - If false, HMAC-based authentication is used
        requestHelperProvider - Should be null to use DefaultRequestHelperProvider

    • Method Detail

      • demoClient

        public static Client demoClient()
        Creates a client with demo credentials. Useful for tests and anonymous access. Warning! Do not use in production. All demo account files are eventually purged.
        Returns:
        A demo client

      • getPublicKey

        public java.lang.String getPublicKey()
        Returns the public key.
        Returns:
        Public key

      • getPrivateKey

        public java.lang.String getPrivateKey()
        Returns the private key.
        Returns:
        Private key

      • isSimpleAuth

        public boolean isSimpleAuth()
        Returns true, if simple authentication is used.
        Returns:
        true, if simple authentication is used, false otherwise

      • getRequestHelper

        public RequestHelper getRequestHelper()

      • getProject

        public Project getProject()
        Requests project info from the API.
        Returns:
        Project resource

      • getFile

        public File getFile(java.lang.String fileId)
        Requests file data.
        Parameters:
        fileId - Resource UUID
        Returns:
        File resource

      • getFiles

        public FilesQueryBuilder getFiles()
        Begins to build a request for uploaded files for the current account.
        Returns:
        File resource request builder

      • deleteFile

        public void deleteFile(java.lang.String fileId)
        Marks a file as deleted.
        Parameters:
        fileId - Resource UUID

      • saveFile

        public void saveFile(java.lang.String fileId)
        Marks a file as saved. This has to be done for all files you want to keep. Unsaved files are eventually purged.
        Parameters:
        fileId - Resource UUID

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes client. Ensures that all connections kept alive by the manager get closed and system resources allocated by those connections are released.

      • copyFile

        public CopyFileData copyFile(java.lang.String fileId,
                             java.lang.String storage)
        Parameters:
        fileId - Resource UUID
        storage - Target storage name
        Returns:
        An object containing the results of the copy request
